column4: anyone have any experience geeting ralink cards working under ubuntu?
I got one working under debian for a friend of mine; IIRC the module built without difficulty
do you have to rebuild the entire kernel or just built the module and do modprobe?
you still haven't got the ralink to work?
ubuntu doesn't see it on install
you may have to get the source tarball and build it yourself
okay can i just build the module and install it?
you'll need the kernel-headers package at least, if not the kernel source; I'd try with the kernel-headers first
well how am i going to download the kernel source if i don't have internet?
I built it on a machine with a kernel I built on it, so I had a full source tree anyway
are kernel-headers on the install cd?
the module source is small, you could just d/l that on another box and stick it on a usb stick
i don't know what card it is?  will lspci tell me?
